com.tokelon.toktales.core.screen.view

Interface IViewTransformer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultViewTransformer

    public interface IViewTransformer
    Transforms coordinates through different layers. All transformations are done using a viewport and a camera, and include conversion from world units to screen pixels.

    The layers are as follows (from top to bottom):

    Screen v [independent of all the below]

    ^ [area on the screen]
    Viewport
    v [scaling between screen (pixels) and world (units) coordinates]

    ^ [positioned on the viewport]
    Camera
    v [area in the world]

    World ^ [independent of all the above]
